item.title: [Python] I want to make a monkey patch only partially with Python?
item.description: What is # monkey patch? Monkey patches can extend or modify the code of dynamic languages (e.g. Smalltalk, JavaScript, Objective-C, Ruby, Perl, Python, Groovy, etc.) at runtime without changing the original source code. Is the way to do it. Wiki Reference Subject Round 3 is no longer rounded off in Python3 print round(2.5) # => 3.0 print(round(2.5)) # => 2 It seems that the round function from python3 is now handled as a floating point.
